item.title: Anti-Collision Light Systems Red Upper and Lower Fuselage Beacon Lights

remarks.para: May be inoperative for night operations provided the White Tail and Wing Tip Strobe lights are operative.

numlitem.para: Night operations permitted if the white tail and wing tip strobe lights are operative.

placard.para: Placard near Beacon Light Switch: "___ FUSELAGE BEACON LIGHT(S) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
